option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
filename of the DataMap file, if this is omitted the document will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Dump the block index (file offsets for each block) of a DataMap file.

description.p: Dump the block index (file offsets for each block) of a DataMap file.
The offsets are written to standard output. The block offsets can be used to quickly locate a specific block in the DataMap file.

example.description: Find the block offsets from the file inp.dmap and store them in the file out.binx
